message: does anyone know what headers googlebot passes?
or a good way to find out?
we have a bug where the server returns 500 if the accept-language header is missing or doesn't have a valid language
yeah i did see that one, i was hoping to find something more along the lines of real documentation instead of a blog post, also it doesn't have the header i was curious about
until the devs fix it, I was wondering if google indexing would be impacted

I'd say you should fix the bug where your server faults when there's not a particular header. If you're returning a 500 response for a particular request (and the googlebot does not include that header) then those pages will not be indexed.
A good rule of thumb is to never return 500 if you can avoid it (and you almost always can).
